name: Rishika Instant Vada Mix 200g

longdescription: Urad Gota is used for preparing idly ,dosa,vada,and other indian recepies. it is a protein rich food and its qaulity is determined by the softness of the batter and taste of the recipe .Tenali Double Horse  urad gota is the best choice as it is procured from the best framers& fields across India .it is processes in hygenical conditions and packed in substainable packing pounches to ensure that the freshness tasts for long time
